page.title: 14Armed Forces / Population
page.content: The Armed forces activities in our area are limited to the Marines rifle range on the beach in Kingsdown.Small arms ammunition has been used here for nearly 100 years.At one time,some of the targets were out at sea,but they have now been washed away in storms.To warn ships in the area,safety lookouts are posted at St.Margarets Bay Coastguard Station and on the cliffs opposite the Butts. From the 1981 census the population for Ringwould was 376 and for Kingsdown 1,442.The people of Ringwould tend to live in the half square mile to the west of the Dover / _ Deal road, opposite the Ringwould road. The population of Kingsdown covers a far larger area.It tends to cover the coastal area for about 1 mile and is due East of Ringwould.
